New Records: Willy Adames tied the MLB record for most 3-run HRs in a season (13) and the MIL record with HRs in 5 straight games
Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio's grand slam (18) in the top of the 9th inning was a turning point in the game
Post-Match Reflections: Joe Ross sealed the Brewers' 9-3 win
